physical_appearance:This is a coloured print and the image captures a bustling open air roadside market place. Vendors spread out their items on a piece of cloth on the ground and sit behind them so as to meet the gaze of the buyer. Electric cords are seen hanging across buildings. On the verso there are two labels; one being the photographer\u0027s studio label (with its address) and the other by The Song Heng Association Singapore \u0026 Overseas Hainanese Artists Art Exhibition 2010.

sgcool_label_text:Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This is a very early and unique print shot on colour film.
